content.question: Which of the following best explains a key reason for the development described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Easier access to technology allowed increased numbers of Internet users.
Internet sites replaced traditional retail outlets for shopping.
Wages for workers at Internet-based businesses increased as the economy improved.
Internet use contributed to debates about changing culture in the United States.

content.answer: Easier access to technology allowed increased numbers of Internet users.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
